summary: U.S. Marshal Bovard comes to a small border town to identify and arrest a fugitive, but the whole town seems determined to prevent the Marshal from doing his job.
cast: Robert Taylor|Tina Louise|Fess Parker|Jack Lord|Gene Evans|Mickey Shaughnessy|Shirley Harmer|James Westerfield|Mabel Albertson|Jose Gonzales-Gonzales|Betty Lynn|Lorne Greene|Richard Collier|Abdullah Abbas|Robert Adler|Fred Aldrich|Rex Andrews|Nick Borgani|Forest Burns|Dorothy Crehan|Chuck Hamilton|Joseph Hamilton|Stuart Holmes|James Hope|Nolan Leary|Nelson Leigh|Billy McCoy|Frank Mills|Frank Richards|Paul Salata|Clint Sharp|George Sowards|Sara Taft|Regis Toomey|Sam Wolfe
title: El justiciero
